tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hashtag_usage_statistics (
    hashtag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hashtag_name VARCHAR(255),
    usage_count INT,
    trending_score FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE usage_statistics (
    usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hashtag_id INT NOT NULL,
    topic_id INT NOT NULL,
    usage_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (hashtag_id) REFERENCES hashtag_usage(hashtag_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (topic_id) REFERENCES trending_topics(topic_id)
);

CREATE TABLE hashtag_usage_statistics (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    hashtag VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    usage_count INTEGER NOT NULL,
    topic VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE topic_trending (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    topic_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    trending_score DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE topic_details (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    topic_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    topic_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    topic_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE topic_history (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    topic_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    usage_date DATE NOT NULL,
    daily_usage_count INTEGER NOT NULL
)
CREATE TABLE hashtag_usage(id INT PRIMARY KEY, hashtag VARCHAR(255), count INT, date DATE)
CREATE TABLE trending_topics(id INT PRIMARY KEY, topic VARCHAR(255), trend_score INT, last_updated TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE hashtag_mentions(id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, hashtag_id INT, mention_date TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE user_activity(user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, activity_type VARCHAR(50), activity_date TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE topic_engagement(topic_id INT PRIMARY KEY, engagement_percentage FLOAT, engagement_date DATE)
